LanguageData.VV_DragonFruitPlant.description: A tropical plant that produces large, vibrant fruits with a sweet and tangy flavor. Dragon fruit plants thrive in hot, sunny climates with well-drained soil.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Dragonfruit plants grow 30% faster in equatorial regions. The size of the equatorial region depends on the planet's overall temperature: below 15ยบ for Normal, below 35ยบ for Warm, below 65ยบ for Hot and all the planet for Very Hot. Planets with below Normal temperature are considered to have no equator.
LanguageData.VV_AmaranthPlant.description: A vibrant, leafy plant that produces small, edible seeds. Amaranth is highly nutritious and can grow in a variety of climates, making it a versatile crop.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Amaranth plants have adapted to drought conditions so well that they recieve a 70% growth penalty when grown within 10 tiles of water.
LanguageData.VV_MilletPlant.description: A hardy, drought-resistant plant that grows in a variety of conditions. Its small, sturdy seeds are a great source of nutrition and can thrive in poor soil.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Millet plants have adapted to drought conditions so well that they recieve a 70% growth penalty when grown within 10 tiles of water.
LanguageData.VV_ArtichokePlant.description: A large, perennial plant with spiky leaves that produces edible flower buds. Artichokes thrive in mild climates with plenty of sunlight.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Artichoke plants are very resistant to damage. They take less damage from prolonged lack of light, and will regenerate damage caused by any other means.
LanguageData.VV_AsparagusPlant.description: Asparagus is a tender vegetable plant grown for its edible green shoots. It thrives in fertile soil and provides a nutritious harvest once mature.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Artichoke plants are very resistant to damage. They take less damage from prolonged lack of light, and will regenerate damage caused by any other means.
